desc: We need to have our product shows up within the first 3 pages in ETSY (sort by relevancy). I am looking for an expert in ETSY algorithm. You must have good understanding of how ETSY algorithm works.Objective:1. For each listing there are around 20 designated keywords.2. Your job is to arrange the title and tags (or other area too if needed), so that my listing will show up within the first 3 pages ( sort by relevancy).3. All the keywords (approx 20) must shows up within the first 3 pages, or at lease a majority (70%) of it.Example of the rundown:Let say the keyword is “black diamond”. You will be given an ETSY account , then publish/ arrange my listings, with the keyword “black diamond” in the title and tag. After you publish the listing, we will check to see if my product land within the first 3 pages.Notes:The listings are already published or in the drafts. Product photos, description and other attribute are already in the ETSY account.I have around 250-300 listings just for ETSY shop.
